feed.title: OpenCDSi
feed.subtitle: Open-sourced immunization decision support system based on the CDC CDSi Logic Spec.

entry.title: The OpenCDSi API
entry.content:
Now you can browse the CDSi supporting data and defined testcases at the CDSi Browser.

The api project exposes the data objects provided by the CDC as JSON over a REST-ish interface. For a more pleasent browsing experience, try the JSONView extension.

Your application can access these endpoints:

  • /api/antigens
  • /api/antigens/{id}
  • /api/antigens/{id}/series
  • /api/antigens/{id}/contraindications
  • /api/vaccines
  • /api/vaccines/{id}
  • /api/vaccines/{id}/conflicts
  • /api/vaccines/{id}/antigens
  • /api/vaccines/groups
  • /api/vaccines/groups/{id}
  • /api/vaccines/groups/{id}/antigens
  • /api/observations
  • /api/observations/{id}
  • /api/testcases
  • /api/testcases/{id}
  • /api/testcases/{id}/medical
entry.summary: Now you can browse the CDSi supporting data and defined testcases at the CDSi Browser. The api project exposes the data objects provided by the CDC as JSON over a REST-ish interface. For a more pleasent browsing experience, try the JSONView extension. Your application can access these endpoints: /api/antigens /api/antigens/{id} /api/antigens/{id}/series /api/antigens/{id}/contraindications /api/vaccines /api/vaccines/{id} /api/vaccines/{id}/conflicts /api/vaccines/{id}/antigens /api/vaccines/groups /api/vaccines/groups/{id} /api/vaccines/groups/{id}/antigens /api/observations /api/observations/{id} /api/testcases /api/testcases/{id} /api/testcases/{id}/medical
